rdf:Description.dc:title: Instrumental enrichment with low achieving adolescents 1984
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Samuels, Marilyn.
Alberta. Alberta Education. Planning Services.
rdf:Description.dc:description: The purpose of this study was to evaulate the effect of a cognitive education program, Feuerstein's Instrumental Enrichment on a class of low achieving adolescents at a vocational school.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Cognition
Underachievers.
Educational tests and measurements
